description: This file defines a React component 'ConfluenceCreatePageModal' used for rendering a modal dialog that allows users to create a Confluence page. It manages form state, validation, and submits data to a backend API endpoint. The component also handles success and error states, and provides UI for user input.

methods.name: ConfluenceCreatePageModal
methods.description: Main React functional component rendering the modal for creating a Confluence page.
